title: Double Apple Lost Mary Tappo Prefilled Pods
description: Lost Mary Tappo Double Apple Pre-filled Replacement Pods feature an vape juice flavour thatâ€™s made up of two different yet equally delicious apple notes. Sweet red apples have been combined with a crisp, slightly sour green apple to produce a flavour like no other. Every pack of the Lost Mary Tappo comes with two replacement pods that have been preloaded with 2ml of nicotine salt vape liquid in a 2%/20mg nicotine strength. The Lost Mary Tappo pod should only be used with the Tappo Pod Kit by Lost Mary , as this is the device they were created for. The Tappo replacement pods have been designed to last for up to 600 puffs each, like most other TPD compliant prefilled vapes - this offers vapers the opportunity to enjoy up to 1200 puffs per pack of Lost Mary pods. Tappo Lost Mary pods are a far cheaper and much more sustainable substitute to the use of disposable vapes . There are currently more than 25 different Lost Mary Tappo flavours in the Lost Mary Tappo replacement pods - each of the available flavours is based on the same popular blends from the best selling BM600 disposable vapes , so you can now enjoy your favourite flavours for longer! Lost Mary Tappo Flavours: Apple Watermelon Banana Ice Blue Razz Blue Sour Raspberry Cherry Cola Cherry Ice Double Apple Grape Kiwi PassionFruit Guava Lemon Ice Lemon and Lime Maryturbo Mix Berries Peach Ice Pineapple Ice Pineapple PassionFruit Lemon Red Cherry Silky Tobacco Spearmint Strawberry Ice Strawberry Raspberry Triple Mango Tropical Fruit USA Mix Watermelon Lost Mary Tappo Pre-filled Replacement Pod Features: Flavour : Red Apple, Green Apple Pod Capacity : 2ml Nicotine Strength : 20mg (2%) Nicotine Type : Nicotine Salts TPD Compliant Prefilled Pods Compatible with Lost Mary Tappo Pod Kit Lost Mary Tappo Package Contains: 2x Lost Mary Tappo Double Apple Pre-filled Replacement Pods
